original_title: Hasta que las nubes nos unan, Guardiola - Diola
overview: Between Africa and the catalonian Penedés stands the distance of a videocamera. A cut. What is what, where are we, where did the songs we sang while we worked go, where is the group, the colective, the community?
title: Hasta que las nubes nos unan, Guardiola - Diola
